author: lgo
msg: Followup to r20235: when setting up the sandbox, use the url of the pristine
repository instead of its dir. On Windows those are not the same for ra_svn
Note: as a result of this fix a bug was discovered that makes commit_tests 13
fail over ra_dav. This failing test will be fixed in a later revision!
(guarantee_greek_repository): use the new global main.pristine_url for
both import in and checkout of the pristine repository.
(make_repo_and_wc): use the new global main.pristine_url when relocating
from the pristine to the sandbox repository.

author: ehu
msg: No longer copy left and right files into the working copy before merging.
(svn_wc_merge2): Docs for svn_io_run_diff3_2 no longer hint at
wanting all targets in one dir or even relative to its dir parameter;
stop copying left and right files to satisfy that alleged requirement.

author: ehu
msg: Simplify diff3 requirements because they needlessly complicate calling code
and there's no evidence they are actually required.
(svn_diff_file_diff3_2): The paths don't need to be absolute; we just
(svn_io_run_diff3_2): There's no evidence we require the files to be
relative to the working directory; we just pass them to diff3.

author: xsteve
msg: (svn-status-mv-cp) new function to run either svn mv or svn cp
(svn-status-cp): New function, bound to `C', runs svn copy (just
(svn-process-sentinel): remove the 'mv stanza -- unused as we do not run
(svn-status-make-line-info): New function to create a line-info
(svn-insert-line-in-status-buffer): Cache the buffer position for a file
